title: Simple Maintenance Tips for Outdoor Fountains and Water Features
intro: Outdoor fountains and water features bring beauty and tranquility to Chicago landscapes, but they require seasonal maintenance to stay clear and functional.
content:
Why Maintenance Matters

Chicagoâ€™s seasonal temperature swings can stress pumps, liners, and stone materials. A little routine maintenance goes a long way toward preventing expensive repairs.

Keep Water Clear

Debris buildup is the most common issue. Regular cleaning prevents algae growth and pump blockages.

Protecting the Pump

Always remove the pump before winter. Freezing temperatures can cause internal cracking and total pump failure.

Refill During Summer

Evaporation is high in hot months, so topping off water levels is important to keep the pump submerged and functional.

Conclusion

A well-maintained fountain adds beauty and peaceful sound to your outdoor space.
